name: @ts-dspy/openai
description: OpenAI ChatGPT integration for TS-DSPy - enables type-safe LLM interactions with GPT-3.5, GPT-4, and other OpenAI models for TypeScript

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:js && npm run build:types
scripts.build:types: mkdir -p temp && tsc src/index.ts src/openai-lm.ts --declaration --outDir temp --skipLibCheck && cp temp/*.d.ts dist/ && rm -rf temp

author: Arnav Dadarya
